metadata.title: CVE-2020-7598 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: minimist before 1.2.2 could be tricked into adding or modifying properties of Object.prototype using a "constructor" or "__proto__" payload.

criterions.comment: node-minimist package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.5-1').
